existing_features.title: Remove the Caffeine branding footer line by deleting the second paragraph element in the Landing Page footer (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/footer[1]/div[1]/div[1]/p[2]) that currently renders “Built with … using caffeine.ai”, including its heart icon and outbound link.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove the Caffeine branding from the website (specifically remove the footer branding element the user selected)
